languages.text: "Примерно. И, на всякий случай, давайте проговорим следующее: ничего из того, что вы увидели, не должно оказаться в отчете маршалу".

traits.locale_text: "Примерно. И, на всякий случай, давайте проговорим следующее: ничего из того, что вы увидели, не должно оказаться в отчете маршалу".

languages.text: "More or less. And just in case it is not clear already: none of what you saw here is going in your report to the Marshal."
languages.original_text: "Примерно. И, на всякий случай, давайте проговорим следующее: ничего из того, что вы увидели, не должно оказаться в отчете маршалу".

traits.locale_text: "More or less. And just in case it is not clear already: none of what you saw here is going into your report to the Marshal."
"More or less. And just in case it is not clear already: none of what you saw here is going into your report to the Marshal."
"More or less. And just in case it is not clear already: none of what you saw here is going in your report to the Marshal."
"More or less. And just in case it is not clear already: none of what you saw here is going in your report to the Marshal."
"More or less. And just in case it is not clear already: none of what you saw here is going in your report to the Marshal."
"More or less. And just in case it is not clear already: none of what you saw here is going in your report to the Marshal."

languages.text: 「まあ、そんなところだ。それと、念のためにはっきり言っておくが、ここで見たことは一切、将帥への報告書には書くな」
languages.original_text: "More or less. And just in case it is not clear already: none of what you saw here is going in your report to the Marshal."

traits.locale_text: 「まあ、そんなところだ。それと、念のためにはっきり言っておくが、ここで見たことは一切、将帥への報告書には書くな」

languages.text: "Mehr oder weniger. Und nur, falls es noch nicht klar sein sollte: Nichts von dem, was Ihr hier gesehen habt, kommt in Euren Bericht für den Marschall."
languages.original_text: "More or less. And just in case it is not clear already: none of what you saw here is going in your report to the Marshal."

traits.locale_text: "Mehr oder weniger. Und nur, falls es noch nicht klar sein sollte: Nichts von dem, was Ihr hier gesehen habt, kommt in Euren Bericht für den Marschall."

languages.text: « Plus ou moins. Et au cas où vous ne l'auriez pas compris : rien de ce que vous avez vu ici ne doit figurer dans votre rapport au maréchal. »
languages.original_text: "More or less. And just in case it is not clear already: none of what you saw here is going in your report to the Marshal."

traits.locale_text: « Plus ou moins. Et au cas où vous ne l'auriez pas compris : rien de ce que vous avez vu ici ne doit figurer dans votre rapport au maréchal. »

languages.text: «Más o menos. Y por si no había quedado lo bastante claro: su informe para el mariscal no incluirá nada de lo que ha presenciado aquí».
languages.original_text: "More or less. And just in case it is not clear already: none of what you saw here is going in your report to the Marshal."

traits.locale_text: «Más o menos. Y por si no había quedado lo bastante claro: su informe para el mariscal no incluirá nada de lo que ha presenciado aquí».

languages.text: “差不多就是这样，还有一点得强调一下：你在这里看到的一切，都禁止写进给元帅的报告里。”
languages.original_text: "More or less. And just in case it is not clear already: none of what you saw here is going in your report to the Marshal."

traits.locale_text: “差不多就是这样，还有一点得强调一下：你在这里看到的一切，都禁止写进给元帅的报告里。”

languages.text: "Aşağı yukarı. Bir de şunu kesin olarak açıklığa kavuşturalım: Burada gördüklerinin hiçbiri, Miralay'a yazacağın raporda kendine yer bulmayacak."
languages.original_text: "More or less. And just in case it is not clear already: none of what you saw here is going in your report to the Marshal."

traits.locale_text: "Aşağı yukarı. Bir de şunu kesin olarak açıklığa kavuşturalım: Burada gördüklerinin hiçbiri, Miralay'a yazacağın rapora girmeyecek."

languages.original_text: "More or less. And just in case it is not clear already: none of what you saw here is going in your report to the Marshal."
